      <div id="about" class="section wow fadeIn">
         <div class="container">
            <div class="heading">
               <span class="icon-logo"><img src="images/icon-logo.png" alt="#"></span>
               <h2>WE PROVIDE SMART SOLUTIONS</h2>
            </div>
            <!-- end title -->
            <div class="row">
               <div class="col-md-6">
                  <div class="message-box">
                     <h2>What We Do</h2>
                     <!-- <h2>Service</h2> -->
                     <p class="lead">AGRIFRIEND connect farmers to people who can provide them with easy access to machinery and labor to harvest stubble in a more eco-friendly way. We also let you choose the way you use that stubble in a way that's beneficial to you.

                        In this way, we can not only reduce greenhouse gas emissions due to stubble burning, but reduce pollution as well, while still being relevant to the needs of India's agriculture community.. </p>
                     
                  </div>
                  <!-- end messagebox -->
               </div>
               <!-- end col -->
